member.name: T:Sudoku.Gdip.GridImageGenerator
member.summary: Defines and encapsulates a data structure that provides the operations to draw a sudoku puzzle.
member.param: Indicates the instance that calculates the pixels to help the inner methods to handle and draw the picture used for displaying onto the UI projects.
Indicates the instance that stores the default preferences that decides the drawing behavior.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Gdip.GridImageGenerator.#ctor(Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator,Sudoku.Gdip.IPreference,Sudoku.Concepts.Grid@)
member.summary: Defines and encapsulates a data structure that provides the operations to draw a sudoku puzzle.
member.param: Indicates the instance that calculates the pixels to help the inner methods to handle and draw the picture used for displaying onto the UI projects.
Indicates the instance that stores the default preferences that decides the drawing behavior.

member.summary: Indicates the instance that calculates the pixels to help the inner methods to handle and draw the picture used for displaying onto the UI projects.

member.summary: Indicates the instance that stores the default preferences that decides the drawing behavior.

member.summary: Defines a grid image generator that parses a sudoku grid and converts it to an image as the result representation.

member.summary: The square root of 2.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Gdip.IGridImageGenerator.RotateAngle
member.summary: The rotate angle (45 degrees). This field is used for rotate the chains if some of them are overlapped.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Gdip.IGridImageGenerator.TextOffset
member.summary: The text offset that corrects the pixel of the text output.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Gdip.IGridImageGenerator.DefaultStringFormat
member.summary: Indicates the default string format.

member.summary: Indicates the drawing width.

member.summary: Indicates the drawing height.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Gdip.IGridImageGenerator.View
member.summary: Indicates the view.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Gdip.IGridImageGenerator.Conclusions
member.summary: Indicates all conclusions.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Gdip.IGridImageGenerator.DrawManually
member.summary: To draw the image manually.
member.remarks: The method may be called manually, because we can't control whether the value is modified.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Gdip.IGridImageGenerator.GetFont(System.String,System.Single,System.Decimal,System.Drawing.FontStyle)
member.summary: Get the font via the specified name, size and the scale.
member.param: The font name that decides the font to use and presentation.
The size that decides the default font size.
The scale that decides the result font size.
The style that decides the font style of the text in the picture.

member.name: T:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator
member.summary: Provides a serial of methods for a point calculator that interacts with the UI projects.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.DefaultOffset
member.summary: Indicates the default offset value.

member.name: F:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.AnchorsCount
member.summary: Indicates the number of anchors hold per house.
member.remarks: The sudoku grid painter will draw the outlines and the inner lines, and correct the point of each digits (candidates also included). Each row or column always contains 27 candidates, so this value is 27.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.Width
member.summary: Indicates the width of the picture to draw.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.Height
member.summary: Indicates the height of the picture to draw.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.Offset
member.summary: Indicates the offset of the gap between the picture box outline and the sudoku grid outline.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.ControlSize
member.summary: Indicates the control size.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.GridSize
member.summary: Indicates the grid size.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.CellSize
member.summary: Indicates the cell size.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.CandidateSize
member.summary: Indicates the candidate size.

member.name: P:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.GridPoints
member.summary: Indicates the absolutely points in grid cross-lines. This property will be assigned later (and not ).
member.remarks: Note that the size of this 2D array is always 28 by 28.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.GetCell(System.Drawing.PointF@)
member.summary: Get the focus cell offset via a mouse point.
member.returns: The cell offset. Returns -1 when the current point is invalid.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.GetCandidate(System.Drawing.PointF@)
member.summary: Get the focus candidate offset via a mouse point.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.GetMouseCenter(Sudoku.Concepts.Candidates@)
member.summary: Get the center mouse point of all candidates.
member.exception: Throws when the argument is invalid.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.GetMouseCenter(Sudoku.Presentation.LockedTarget@)
member.summary: Gets the center mouse point of the specified locked target.
member.exception: Throws when the argument is invalid.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.GetMouseRectangle(Sudoku.Concepts.Candidates@)
member.summary: Get the rectangle from all candidates.
member.exception: Throws when the argument is invalid.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.GetMouseRectangleViaCell(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the rectangle (4 mouse points) via the specified cell.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.GetMouseRectangle(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the rectangle (4 mouse points) for the specified cell and digit of a candidate.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.GetMouseRectangleViaHouse(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the rectangle (4 mouse points) via the specified house.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.GetMousePointInCenter(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the mouse point of the center of a cell via its offset.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.GetMousePointInCenter(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the mouse point of the center of a cell via its offset and the digit.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.GetAnchorsViaHouse(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets two points that specifies and represents the anchors of this house.

member.name: M:Sudoku.Gdip.IPointCalculator.CreateConverter(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a instance with the specified size, and the offset.
member.param: The offset. The default value is 10.
